Hellen Lukoma bụ onye Uganda, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nlereanya, onye na'emepụta ejiji na onye na-agụ egwu

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Patra na The Hostel, Hellen Mutungi na Beneath The Lies, kyaddala Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama dị ka onye otu egwu ụmụ nwanyị niile The Obsessions tupu ọ banye n'ime ihe ngosi, imewe ejiji na ime ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ Hellen ma zụlite ya na Kampala
Ọ tolitere n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne isii ma ọ bụ ya bụ nwa ikpeazụ a mụrụ.
Hellen gara Shimon Primary School na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị lubiri
Ọ sonyeere Makerere University Business School wee nweta nzere bachelọ na Internal business.
Ọ lụrụ Anwar Kaka ma nwee ụmụ abụọ.
